title: Abenaki Confederacy
description: An alliance of Abenaki bands in what is now Vermont and New Hampshire, known for their birchbark canoes and Wabanaki Confederacy ties.

title: Crow Nation (Absaroka)
description: The Apsáalooke (“Children of the Large-Beaked Bird”) occupy the Crow Indian Reservation in south-central Montana.

title: Trail of Tears
description: The forced removal (1830s) of the Cherokee, Muscogee, Seminole, Chickasaw and Choctaw nations from the southeastern United States.
